snippet: If you like to cook, making ketchup (or mayo, or mustard) is better than fixing the mysterious dent in our car door, patching up the wall where the doorknob bashes it, or clean up anything at all.
abstract: If you like to cook, making ketchup (or mayo, or mustard) is better than fixing the mysterious dent in our car door, patching up the wall where the doorknob bashes it, or clean up anything at all.

headline.main: Heinz vs. Homemade: I Actually Like Making Ketchup
